title: How Can I Get Rid of Him - Novel Updates
tags: Abusive Characters   Chat Rooms   Long Separations   Lovers Reunited   Modern Day   Persistent Love Interests   Protagonist Falls in Love First
author: 小仲
description: The person he has been with for five years doesn’t actually like him. Mo Xi understands this. It’s all just emotions he can’t control. After being devoted to him for five years, at the crucial moment, Pei Hao still saved the white moonlight in his heart instead of him. Mo Xi has nothing more to say. He has finally seen through the five-year relationship. It is nothing but a bubble – easy to break up but difficult to get rid of. How do you get rid of a person you once loved so much?>
